meanings.sent1: The pararosanilines added vibrant colors to the fabric.
meanings.sent2: She studied the different types of pararosanilines in her chemistry class.
meanings.sent3: The pararosanilines decided to have a colorful party on the cloth.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork bloomed like pararosanilines in a field of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The pararosanilines danced across the material, painting it with hues of joy.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound used in the production of dyes.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers mixed the pararosanilines carefully to create new colors.
meanings.sent2: Scientists discovered the effectiveness of pararosanilines in dye manufacturing.
meanings.sent3: The pararosanilines threw a party in the lab, celebrating their colorful contributions.
meanings.sent4: In the world of dyes, pararosanilines stood out like a bright beacon of innovation.
meanings.sent5: The pararosanilines transformed the plain liquid into a rainbow of possibilities.
